item.title: What Is Above The Fold Content? | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites
item.description: Above The Fold When you first navigate to a website the content you see on the screen is called above the fold content. On any device, loading above the fold content first, and the rest of the content later, will speed up the rendering of the website by the browser.

item.title: Website Images | Build Hello | We design, code, and fix websites, and minimize how much it costs to develop a website over the span of your five year business plan.
item.description: While videos drive more social media engagement than images, images remain one of the most important aspects of web design. They play a key role in creating attraction and conveying brand identity.

item.title: Web Development | Build Hello Business | Basically we build you a space ship, a space station, a space world...whatever you want.
item.description: When your business is online, customers can see your on their phones! That’s where you want to be! Give us a call to help out with, oh any websites you’ve ever dreamed of!

item.title: Refactoring | Build Hello Business | That's 'refactoring of code,' which is to say modernizing and simplifying any...how can we say this politely...'cryptography' you've been saddled with into a modern top tier code base.
item.description: Refactoring your code base is more than proactive troubleshooting, it’s SEO, security, and better functionality all in one. Stay ahead of the crowd, refactor that code base!
